price: Ва дар он ҷо ҷомҳое сероб мешаванд, ки омезааш занҷабил аст
arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayus'qawna fīhā kasan kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlan
translations: And they will be given to drink
